symbolicName - symbolicName

installBundleAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> installBundleAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                   String location)
Installs a bundle asynchronously

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
location - The location identifier of the bundle to install.
Returns:
A Future<Bundle> object of the installed bundle.
Since:
1.1

installBundleAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> installBundleAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                   String location,
                                                                   InputStream input)
Installs a bundle asynchronously

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
location - The location identifier of the bundle to install.
input - The InputStream object from which this bundle will be read or null to indicate the Framework must create the input stream from the specified location identifier. The input stream must always be closed when this method completes, even if an exception is thrown.
Returns:
A Future<Bundle> object of the installed bundle.
Since:
1.1

installBundleAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> installBundleAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                   String location,
                                                                   long delayInMillis)
Installs a bundle asynchronously with delayInMillis

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
location - The location identifier of the bundle to install.
delayInMillis - time interval in millis to wait before installation. If zero, the method will not wait.
Returns:
A Future<Bundle> object of the installed bundle.
Since:
1.1

installBundleAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> installBundleAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,
                                                                   String location,
                                                                   InputStream input,
                                                                   long delayInMillis)
Installs a bundle asynchronously with delayInMillis

Parameters:
bc - BundleContext
location - The location identifier of the bundle to install.
input - The InputStream object from which this bundle will be read or null to indicate the Framework must create the input stream from the specified location identifier. The input stream must always be closed when this method completes, even if an exception is thrown.
delayInMillis - time interval in millis to wait before installation. If zero, the method will not wait.
Returns:
A Future<Bundle> object of the installed bundle.
Since:
1.1

installBundleAsync

public static Future<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> installBundleAsync(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bc,

timeUnit - time unit for the time interval

A Future<Bundle> object of the installed bundle.

delayInMillis - time interval in millis to wait before uninstall. If zero, the method will not wait.
Returns:
The Future's get method will return null upon successful completion.
Since:
1.1
